values.value: var parseManager = function  parseManager(){                 this.version = 1;                                  this.parsePath = function(obj, path){                                 if (path == null || !(Array.isArray(path)) || path.length == 0){                                                 return obj;                                 }                                  var subPath = path[0];                                                                  var key = subPath[0];                                 var value = subPath[1];                                                                  if (Array.isArray(obj)){                                                 for (var i = 0; i < obj.length; i++){                                                                 if (checkValue(obj[i], key, value)){                                                                                 return this.parsePath(obj[i], path.slice(1));                                                                 }                                                 }                                                 return null;                                 } else {                                                 for(var property in obj){                                                                 if (property == key){                                                                                 if (value == null){                                                                                                 return this.parsePath(obj[key], path.slice(1));                                                                                 } else if (obj[property] == value) {                                                                                                 return this.parsePath(obj[key], path.slice(1));                                                                                 }                                                                 }                                                 }                                                 return null;                                 }                                                                  return null;                                                                                                                                    function checkValue (obj, key, value){                                                 for(var property in obj){                                                                 if (property == key && obj[property] == value){                                                                                 return true;                                                                 }                                                 }                                                 return false;                                 }                 };  };  parseManager;

exec: tests["Successful Get PO By ID RT Request"] = responseCode.code === 200;
tests["Successful Match of the PO By ID in RT Request"] = isPOIdMatched;
tests["Same Count of Chars returned from Rest and Runtime"] = isPOCharsCountSame;
tests["All the PO Characteristic's found in RT Get"] = isPOCharsIdSame;

tests["All the POP Characteristic's found in RT Get"] = isPOPCharsIdSame;
tests["All the POP characteristic Values are matching in RT Get"] = isPOPCharsValueSame;
